oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Suggestions on Labor Journalism
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: List of suggestions giving guidance on creating shop papers for unions. Topics covered include covering local war efforts, funding and editorial boards, and how to interest members in the union via the paper. The paper advises that "The heart of the local or shop labor paper is the shop news or plant gossip column" and to give lots of attention to local shop sports and social events.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Journalism; Editorials; Labor journalism; Labor union members; Women labor union members; Civil rights; Bonds; Labor leaders; Labor unions
